question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. man in striped t-shirt
B. man on the right
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The man in the striped t-shirt is on the left and is leaning forward, with his arm and drink bottle extending toward the camera, making him clearly closer than the man on the right, who is seated further back and more to the side.
